name: Negligent homicide in the second degree
text:
(1)  A person is guilty of the offense of negligent homicide in the second degree if that person causes the death of another person by the operation of a vehicle in a negligent manner.
	(2)  Negligent homicide in the second degree is a class C felony. [L 1972, c 9, pt of §1; am L 1988, c 292, §2]
Case Notes
  Section does not preclude charging defendant on one count for each victim injured fatally.  62 H. 389, 615 P.2d 748.
